title: TutsPlus Create Product Mock Ups in  Adobe Photoshop
description:
TutsPlusCreate Product Mock Ups in  Adobe Photoshop


The course will give you a better understanding of how to create product
mock-ups in Adobe Photoshop and how to create realistic presentations of
product concepts. When pitching a design, the presentation can be crucial
to convincing the client to go with a concept. So you have a cool design
and you know that the client will love it, but what if you had a
great-looking mock-up as well? What if you could turn the flat 2D design
into a 3D-like presentation? In this course you will learn how to create
such mock-ups so you can wow your client and close the deal
